#Installment 4 run

```{r}
library(ttest)
library(ggplot2)
library(kableExtra)

#generate x and y
#and set alpha
set.seed(21)
x <-rnorm(30,5,2)
set.seed(23)
y<- rnorm(30,3,2)
alpha <- 0.05

#set function to object
obj = tConstr(x=x, y=y, alpha=alpha)

#change class to Rttest
attr(obj, "class") ="Rttest"

#call function object parts
class(obj)
print(obj)
plot(obj)

shinyOutput(x,y)

```
